body: A Smuggler is a merchant accustomed to performing her duties beneath the notice of authorities. She's typically a 3rd-level bard, expert, rogue, or member of any class devoted to subterfuge. A Smuggler might run a Black Market, illegal caravan, or ring of smuggling ships.
name: Smuggler
skills: Appraise, Bluff, Knowledge (local), Sleight of Hand
